text: In taxonomy, Yangia is a genus of the Rhodobacteraceae.See the NCBI webpage on Yangia. Data extracted from the Up to now there is only on species of this genus known (Yangia pacifica)LPSN lpsn.dsmz.de ==References== ==Further reading== ===Scientific journals=== * ===Scientific books=== * ===Scientific databases=== ==External links== Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera Category:Rhodobacteraceae
